Heretic II 
For unlocking 60 fps use hexeditor find string "maxfps" near this text you will find number 30 change it to 60 now run game use console and write "cl_maxfps 60" until now game will always use 60 fps and cant change to 30 back
Heretic II
I am found how to change resolution.
hexstring "028001E0" that represent 640x480 and change it to "07800438" it resolution 1920x1080. 
02 80 01 E0
(02 80 hex) = (640 dec)
(01 E0 hex) = (480 dec)
1920 dec = 0780 hex
1080 dec = 0438 hex
